title: Baked stuffed marrow
ingredients: ['1 short thick marrow, about 900g', '40g butter', '1 onion, chopped', '2 celery sticks, chopped', '1 garlic clove, crushed', '2 x 400g cans chopped tomatoes', '3 tbsp shredded fresh basil', '50g fresh white breadcrumbs', '25g mature Cheddar, finely grated', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper', 'fresh basil to garnish (optional)']
